data.title: Die Sprengkraft der Miniatur. Zur Kurzprosa Robert Walsers, Kafkas, Musils, mit einer antithetischen Eröffnung zu Thomas Mann. Von Bernhard Böschenstein. Hildesheim: Olms, 2013. 234 Seiten. €38,00.
data.meta_description: In this collection of thirteen essays written over the span of thirty-six years, between 1973 and 2009, Bernhard Böschenstein invites his readers to an erudite stroll through key texts by Thomas Mann, Jean Paul, Robert Walser, Franz Kafka, and Robert Musil. These essays are published in their
